sub_title: Head of People at Entrepreneur First
summary:
Life is an adventure and it has taken me to live in some of the world's most beautiful places: Geneva, Amsterdam and Singapore - not forgetting my beautiful Yorkshire!  Through these moves, I have been fortunate to see talent and people practices in action in more than 30 countries and across startups, scaleups and major tech. These experiences and learnings fuel my passion for talent, engagement, diversity, inclusion and culture every day.

Being part of Uber's journey in the period of hypergrowth, transformation and the path to IPO was an incredible experience in scaling people and talent.  I now get to see the earliest possible phase of startups, right from company creation, as Head of People at Entrepreneur First (early-stage VC).  Our mission is to create the next wave of globally important companies, with our portfolio already including the UK's 100th tech unicorn, Tractable.  Collectively, EF companies exceed $10b in enterprise value and have created 3,000+ employment opportunities globally to date!

Having relocated back from Singapore in 2020, Amsterdam is 'home' and I work remotely at EF alongside the London leadership team, my People team of four, and our global office network in Europe, Asia and the US.

profile_positions.description:
Entrepreneur First is the best place in the world to meet your co-founder and build a startup from scratch. 
Every six months, in six countries around the world, we bring together and fund exceptional individuals to help them meet their co-founder, develop an idea and raise money from leading investors - as fast as possible.

The companies built at EF are now worth over $10bn. They include Tractable (a computer vision unicorn), Cleo, Omnipresent, Aztec, Transcelestial, Airbank and many more.

We’re backed by some of the world's best tech founders and company builders, including Patrick and John Collison (Stripe); Reid Hoffman (LinkedIn), Tom Blomfield (GoCardless and Monzo), Sara Clemens (Pandora and Twitch); Nat Friedman (GitHub); and Matt Mullenweg (Wordpress).

For more information about Entrepreneur First, visit www.joinef.com.

EF is all about amazing people - the founders we serve and the team that delivers our mission.  As a talent investor, we care deeply about creating opportunities for outsized impact and accelerated learning.  We work collaboratively globally and cross functionally to continually improve how our platform works and prepare for sustained future growth.  I'm deeply proud of both our achievements to date and also our special culture.  I lead our team of 5 people and talent professionals, reporting to our COO, and working with our leaders and wider teams across Europe, Asia and the US.
profile_positions.title: Head of People

profile_positions.description: Joining EF with the exciting mission of building out the global internal talent function; planning and managing the delivery of our hiring activity across all programme, central and leadership roles across the team of 100+ in six countries.  Running new initiatives and projects to increase recruiting capability and preparing for future scale, creating talent and succession plans, embedding D&I, process design and talent attraction work. Essentially a Talent & People Partner to leaders across the org.
profile_positions.title: Recruiting Manager

profile_positions.description:
Part of the hyper growth / worldwide expansion and internal change journey, seeing the organisation scale from 9,000 to 25,000+ employees in just 3 years! 

* Lead Recruiter for the People, Talent & Workplaces orgs in EMEA, scaling the teams from <25 to 100+, thus enabling them to drive cultural and transformation work.  Drove expansion in the Netherlands, UK, France, Egypt, Ukraine, Dubai, Ireland, Poland, Portugal and more! Also hiring senior Legal roles and partnering with EMEA leadership to build the EA team.

* Supported ongoing transformation by partnering with Global Mobility, D&I, Recruiting Operations, HRBP, People Ops and Total Rewards functions to deliver projects and implement new processes.
profile_positions.title: Senior Corporate Recruiter, Amsterdam & EMEA

profile_positions.description: Six month international assignment as the Uber Eats talent acquisition lead for APAC. Delivered the project of 25+ critical openings within Strategy, Regional Ops & Program Management. Ran talent events and & built pipelining capability with the sourcing function.
profile_positions.title: Senior Recruiter, Singapore & APAC - Uber Eats (International Assignment)

profile_positions.description:
* Progressed through positions based in the UK, Switzerland and Singapore
* Lead for Human Resources division in Geneva, including people management
* Final role within Page Executive as Associate Director, South East Asia, hiring leaders in Healthcare & Lifesciences in Myanmar, Korea, Thailand, Indonesia, Philippines & Singapore.
profile_positions.title: International Recruitment - UK / Switzerland / Singapore
